Rajon Rondo

Pronunciation: \RAH-zhon\

Rajon Pierre Rondo ▪ Instagram: rajonrondo

(Johnny, Playoff Rondo, Swag, The Yoga Instructor)

Position: Point Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-1, 180lb (185cm, 81kg)

Born: February 22, 1986 in Louisville, Kentucky us

College: Kentucky

High Schools: Eastern in Louisville, Kentucky, Oak Hill Academy in Mouth of Wilson, Virginia

Recruiting Rank: 2004 (21)

Draft: Phoenix Suns, 1st round (21st pick, 21st overall), 2006 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: November 1, 2006

Career Length: 16 years

  • 4x All Star
  • 3x AST Champ
  • 2009-10 STL Champ
  • 2x NBA Champ
  • 2011-12 All-NBA
  • 2006-07 All-Rookie
  • 4x All-Defensive

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Rajon Rondo?

Rajon Rondo is 39 years old.

Where was Rajon Rondo born?

Rajon Rondo was born in Louisville, Kentucky.

When was Rajon Rondo born?

Rajon Rondo was born on February 22, 1986.

How tall is Rajon Rondo?

Rajon Rondo is 6-1 (185 cm) tall.

How much did Rajon Rondo weigh when playing?

Rajon Rondo weighed 180 lbs (81 kg) when playing.

Is Rajon Rondo in the Hall of Fame?

Rajon Rondo is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Rajon Rondo drafted?

Rajon Rondo was drafted by Phoenix Suns, 1st round (21st pick, 21st overall), 2006 NBA Draft.

What position did Rajon Rondo play?

Point Guard.

When did Rajon Rondo retire?

Rajon Rondo last played in 2022.

What is Rajon Rondo's net worth?

Rajon Rondo made at least $117,897,637 playing professional basketball.

How much did Rajon Rondo make?

Rajon Rondo made $14,000,000 in 2017.

What did Rajon Rondo average?

Rajon Rondo averaged 9.8 points, 4.5 rebounds, and 7.9 assists per game.

How many rings does Rajon Rondo have?

Rajon Rondo won 2 championships.

What is Rajon Rondo's Twitter account?

Rajon Rondo is on Twitter at RajonRondo.

What is Rajon Rondo's Instagram account?

Rajon Rondo is on Instagram at rajonrondo.

What schools did Rajon Rondo attend?

Rajon Rondo attended Eastern in Louisville, Kentucky, Oak Hill Academy in Mouth of Wilson, Virginia and Kentucky.

What are Rajon Rondo's nicknames?

Johnny, Playoff Rondo, Swag, The Yoga Instructor are nicknames for Rajon Rondo.
